settings.label: Base size
settings.info: Used for section titles and main section headings

settings.label: Template size
settings.info: Used for product, collection, article and page templates

settings.label: Secondary size
settings.info: Used for blog post grid, text columns with images and other secondary headings

settings.label: Width
settings.info: Set to 0 to show no border

settings.content: Shadow will not display if media is inside a card.

settings.label: Color
settings.info: Gradient will fallback to border color if shadow style is set to border.

settings.label: Show border on shadow
settings.info: Border color and width will use border settings above.

settings.label: Thickness
settings.info: Applies to all icons except social icons.

settings.label: Image shape
settings.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

settings.label: Show on sale and sold out badges
Metafield key
settings.info: Add metafield key with the namespace shapes_theme. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/show-custom-badges.html)

settings.label: Parallax intensity
settings.info: Adjust the level of parallax animations. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/)

settings.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
